item.title: Writing useful comments
item.description: We often talk about avoiding unnecessary comments that needlessly paraphrase what the code does. In this article, I gathered some thoughts about why writing comments is as important as writing the code itself, and how to spot comments that should be refactored using the 'what' and the 'why'.
